name: AgSquared
tag_list: green-tech, agriculture, farming, local-food, food-supply-chain, erp
overview:
AgSquared is planning and management software for sustainable farmers. AgSquared’s goal is to improve the management of small farm operations making them more productive, profitable, and sustainable.

AgSquared guides farmers in making a yearly plan for their crops, turning that plan into a management schedule and staying on track as the season progresses, all the while capturing detailed data about their operations. At season’s end, AgSquared helps farmers review their records to make better choices in the next season.
